Hi,

with this grammar

this.Root = program;           

program.Rule = declarations + blocks               

|declarations+operations;           

declarations.Rule = MakePlusRule(declarations, declaration);           

declaration.Rule = declarationArray|declarationVariable;         

declarationVariable.Rule = identifier + ToTerm(":") + variableType + semi;         

declarationArray.Rule = identifier + ":" + "an" + "array" + "of" + identifier + semi;                

variableType.Rule = number;
